title: Draft Community Engagement Plan
description: A project developer needs to create a community engagement plan for a new wind farm project to address local concerns.

tasks.description: Identify key community stakeholders, including local government officials, landowners, and community groups.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a categorized list of stakeholders.

tasks.description: Research common community concerns about wind farms (e.g., visual impact, noise, property values).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent summarizes the top 5 most frequent concerns.

tasks.description: Draft a plan that includes a timeline of activities like town hall meetings, project newsletters, and a dedicated project website.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a structured engagement plan with clear action items.
